name: order-form.toml

description.summary: Form to create a new care service order

rawContent:
# Order Form Route
# Service order creation form

[route]
id = "order-form"
path = "/prototype/client/order"
title = "New Order"

[page]
type = "public"
role = "client"

[page.description]
summary = "Form to create a new care service order"
features = [
  "Phone number input",
  "Service type selection",
  "Location input (address, city)",
  "Date and time selection",
  "Optional notes"
]

[relations]
guards = ["public"]
roles = ["client"]
entities = ["order", "service"]
platforms = ["client-app"]

[implementation]
component = "OrderForm"
file = "src/prototype/pages/client/OrderForm.tsx"
status = "planned"
